amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary to use funds for the Blueberry Lake project.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1743 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1743 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S11816-11819) To authorize the Secretary to use funds for the Blueberry Lake project.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1743 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1743 proposed by Senator Dorgan for Senator Leahy.
